main event: A witness observed a green flaming object in the sky in Kettering, Ohio on May 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object first appeared orange before becoming green., The sighting lasted for approximately 60 seconds., The object was first seen 1300 feet away and disappeared 1900 feet away., The report mentions possibilities like meteor fireballs, aircraft, or satellites., The witness was driving home at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Tyson Neil, 35, male, from Kettering, Ohio
